tasks.label: autoformat
tasks.detail: Use ruff and black to automatically fix and format the code

tasks.label: autoformat and commit
tasks.detail: Use ruff and black to automatically fix and format the code and commit changes
tasks.command: git commit -a -m 'autoformatted and ruff --fix all code' || true

tasks.label: pylint
tasks.detail: Run pylint on files tracked by git

tasks.label: code coverage
tasks.detail: Run code coverage and print a coverage report, also update coverage.xml for in the in-editor coverage gutter
tasks.command: coverage run -m pytest; coverage xml -o coverage.xml

tasks.label: code coverage report
tasks.detail: Display the code coverage report. This assumes you have already have a coverage report generated. If not run the code ocverage task

tasks.label: pytest duration
tasks.detail: Run pytest and track the duration of each test

tasks.label: check CI
tasks.detail: Runs the basic formatting and linting checks performed by CI

tasks.label: check CI and commit
tasks.detail: Pull,s from main, runs the basic formatting and linting checks performed by CI and pushes changes

tasks.label: git pull origin main
tasks.detail: merge changes from master into the current branch and push
tasks.command: git pull --commit --no-edit ; git pull origin main --commit --no-edit && git push

tasks.label: git push
tasks.detail: merge changes from master into the current branch and push

tasks.label: git pull origin main and push
tasks.detail: merge changes from master into the current branch and push

tasks.label: pull updates from template repo
tasks.detail: Pull any changes from the template repo into this repo by adding it as a remote. The remote is removed at the end of the command.  You may need to resolve merge conflicts
tasks.command: git remote add template https://github.com/blooop/python_template.git; git fetch --all;git checkout main; git pull origin main; git checkout -B feature/update_from_template; git pull; git merge template/main --allow-unrelated-histories -m 'pull changes from remote template'; git remote remove template; git push origin feature/update_from_template

tasks.label: rename template project name
tasks.detail: Replaces all instances of the template project name with a new name.

tasks.label: set <cfg> from active file; sa
tasks.command: echo ${file} > ${workspaceFolder}/.vscode/active_file.cfg; echo Setting the current file: ${file} as the active file.

tasks.label: run <cfg> with scoop
tasks.command: RUNFILE=$(cat ${workspaceFolder}/.vscode/active_file.cfg); echo Running file: $RUNFILE; python3 -m scoop $RUNFILE

inputs.description: The new name of the project
